Created on Mar 8, 2012

@author: regger

Functions

con_file_to_NumberOfConnectedCells_sheet(...)

con_file: path to .con file genereate by SingleCellInputMapper

write_anatomical_realization_map([fname, ...])

writes list of all functional connections coded by tuples (cell type, presynaptic cell index, synapse index).

write_cell_synapse_locations([fname, ...])

writes list of all synapses with the locations coded by section ID and section x of cell with ID 'cellID'

write_landmark_file([fname, landmarkList])

write Amira landmark file landmarkList has to be iterable of tuples, each of which holds 3 float coordinates

Classes

implements 3D scalar field based on numpy array used for e.g.

singlecell_input_mapper.singlecell_input_mapper.writer.write_anatomical_realization_map(fname=None, functionalMap=None, anatomicalID=None)[source]

writes list of all functional connections coded by tuples (cell type, presynaptic cell index, synapse index). Only valid for anatomical synapse realization given by anatomicalID

singlecell_input_mapper.singlecell_input_mapper.writer.write_cell_synapse_locations(fname=None, synapses=None, cellID=None)[source]

writes list of all synapses with the locations coded by section ID and section x of cell with ID ‘cellID’

singlecell_input_mapper.singlecell_input_mapper.writer.write_landmark_file(fname=None, landmarkList=None)[source]

write Amira landmark file landmarkList has to be iterable of tuples, each of which holds 3 float coordinates
